# Source Language
English

steady

Adjective: firm, regular, not shaking or changing suddenly

# Paragraph Context
The path was long but not steep. <fragment>Keep a <target>steady</target> pace as you climb the hill.</fragment> We will rest at the top.
{"word_translation":"stable","fragment_translation":"Garde un rythme stable en montant la colline"}
